## Explorium MCP Server

Use your Apify credits to run the Explorium MCP Server, giving language models real-time access to comprehensive business intelligence data including company, contact, and market insightsâ€”no manual data gathering required. 📈

### How to Use

*   **Connect to a Language Model:** To use this server with a model like Claude, provide it with this endpoint:
    `https://mcp-servers--explorium-mcp-server.apify.actor/mcp`
*   **Test with the Apify Client:** You can also test the server directly using your Apify credits via our client (connect your client to the endpoint above):
    `https://apify.com/client-mcp-inspector` (Link to the live Inspector if available, or the command `npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector` if CLI only).

### Available Tools

Access a suite of powerful tools for rich business intelligence:
*   `match-business`: Find companies by name, domain, or ID.
*   `fetch-businesses`: Get detailed firmographics, technographics, and business intelligence.
*   `enrich-prospects`: Access contact information, work history, and professional profiles.
*   `web-search`: Perform live, up-to-date web searches for relevant information.
*   ...and more for prospect discovery, events tracking, and autocomplete.
